title: Set alias for columns in data set but in expression builder still shows the old column names when selecting the dataset
SR:
1. Create a new data source and dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset as 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the expression builder.
5. Try to select the dataset in the expression builder.
6. Observe the column names that are displayed in the expression builder.
